title: New: Stay + – Guardian (Feat. Daniel O’Sullivan)
content:
Manchester duo Stay + sure know how to experiment, with their new EP Arem set to be released on limited edition (144 copies) folded 50″, specially packaged with a bunch of extras and downloadable content.

Featuring the previously heard Dandelion Seed (Feat. Psychologist) alongside four new tracks, including a collaboration with Daniel O’Sullivan (Sun O)))) and Miracle), Arem showcases the groups intention to push the boundaries of our preconceptions of a physical release.

Guardian, the first single from the EP is a Crystal Castles-esque dance number, floaty vocals and side-chain compressed synths dominating the track to fantastic effect. Check out Guardian below, and get more info on the Arem EP release via their official site.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
